data.text: Naa ʋolu ma lobai ɠa ʋɔnɔ Izayi ma lɔkulugi ʋa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-Zɛnvui ɠa ɠɛ ba,
Nɛɛbɛ vai ɠa ɠɛ ga é ɠolo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Kɛlɛ toɠa bala nuiti tukpɔɠaaleʋe ga telebodai,
Telebodai ɠa ɠɛ saamaʋɛ ga saamaɠiligi,
Zuluɓui ta baala ziʋoi ta ɠɛ zeizu ada ɠila,
Nikɛ zaai ta zuluɓu zaai ti-laamiizuʋɛ ɠa ɠɛ ga ada ɠila,
Ɲiimiɓɔlegi ɠa ɗa ɠaɠo gozagi ná-zeɠei laaʋɛ.
Faa ɲɔu nɔpɛ, ɓaa faa zuɠoloɠolo nɔpɛ ge la ɠɛa GALA ná-gizei ma.
Naama volo ná, Izayi mavofodai ɠa lo eɠɛ poogi nuɓusɛiti bɛ,
Naama volo ná, Maliɠii ɠa wuzeɠe mɔnɔ
Toɠa poogi lɛ, é zii ɠiligi naati tɛnɛ
Ta woola ma, ti loo Filisiti ɠizeiti ma folo liizu ʋelei,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa Ezipete ɓoloɗɛi vɔ.
Pele ɠila ka ɠɛ ná ná-nuɓusɛi mɔtaiti bɛ,
